.. _sideband_reference:

Sideband Class Reference
=======================

.. currentmodule:: triggercalib.hlteff

The Sideband class manages the definition of sideband regions for the sideband-subtraction background mitigation method.
It provides utilities for defining signal and sideband regions, and calculates appropriate scale factors by which to estimate background densities.
